articles.title: Xi Tells Putin to Reach ‘Fair’ Peace Deal to End War on Ukraine - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping said he hopes to see a “fair” peace deal on Ukraine, the latest move in his balancing act to mend ties with Europe in the face of a de facto trade embargo from the US.
articles.content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping said he hopes to see a fair peace deal on Ukraine, the latest move in his balancing act to mend ties with Europe in the face of a de facto trade embargo from the US.

articles.title: How Europe is commemorating the 80th anniversary of the Nazis' surrender in WWII - NPR
articles.description: Thursday marks 80 years since Victory in Europe Day, when the Allies accepted Nazi Germany's unconditional surrender. The day will be marked with memorials and moments of silence across Europe.
articles.content:
LONDON Eighty years ago, the Allies announced they had accepted Nazi Germany's unconditional surrender.
